entry.title: Thursday: Periods of rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this afternoon then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain near noon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h this afternoon. High plus 3. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
